name: Karthik Ganesan
summary: Full-stack developer with 5 years of experience in backend development and building scalable microservices. Proficient in Python, FastAPI, and cloud technologies including Kubernetes and Docker. Passionate about AI and automation, with a strong understanding of RESTful API design.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Led development of a scalable microservices architecture serving 1M+ users, contributing to a distributed system.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 60% and improving overall development efficiency.
Mentored a team of 4 junior developers, fostering their growth in backend development practices.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Built RESTful APIs using Python and FastAPI, demonstrating a strong understanding of API design.
Developed React frontend components for e-commerce platform, contributing to a seamless user experience.
Optimized database queries, improving performance by 40% and enhancing application responsiveness.
